forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 49F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally clear skies. Low 37F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High around 10C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 5C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low around 40F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 48F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low near 40F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 11C. ESE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 51F. ESE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 11C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 51F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
